value.title: How to use multiple url filters with Power BI reports
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick walks through how to use multiple URL filters with Power BI reports. This adds onto the previous videos we posted regarding how to filter reports using the URL.  URL Filtering Documentation - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-service-url-filters/  LET'S

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh

value.title: INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground (2021)
value.excerpt: Want to try things out with Power BI Embedded? Want to explore the JavaScript API? Try embedding with your own report? Then you need to check out the INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground! Amit Shuster walks us through the revamp. value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports. value.title: Merging your data in a modern lakehouse data warehouse
value.excerpt: Learn how you can move your data through different tiers using MERGE either with pySpark or SQL in Azure Synapse Analytics. Stijn Wynants walks you through the different steps.  Stijn Wynants https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  pyspark.sql.SparkSession.createDataFrame https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.SparkSession.createDataFrame.html

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? value.title: Native Query: Be careful when using in Power BI
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at native query and why you should be careful when using it in Power BI. He looks at what native query is, what to consider when using it, and how to monitor what query folding, in Power Query, is or is not doing. value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!
value.excerpt: Last week we looked at the O365 Bubble and how we use Authentication to go in and out.  This week we show it in action!  We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth
